{{DISPLAYTITLE:Launcher 2.1.11''xx''}}'''2.1.1143''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.1144''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.1139''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on June 21, 2018.

== Additions ==
* Added "Shakespearan English - Kingdom of England" as new language.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-5291}}: Error Code 5 - Problem moving <code>tmplauncher.tmp</code> to <code>Minecraft.exe</code>.
* {{bug|MCL-6129}}: Outdated digital signature by Mojang for "<code>MinecraftInstaller.msi</code>".
* {{bug|MCL-7387}}: First login of fresh install is not remembered (Linux launcher only).
* {{bug|MCL-9304}}: Linux: ICU version issues.
* {{bug|MCL-9319}}: Launcher crashes after staying on and exiting the game.

== Reupload ==
2.1.11''xx'' was reuploaded on the same day, to fix the missing integration of a <code>dll</code>.
